name: Groundbreaking Sorcerers
description:
Groundbreaking Sorcerers is my first attempt at Game Jam. It's 2 player 2D arena fighter with destructible enviroment.  Players are sorcerers weilding magic orbs they can either pull to themself or push away, in order to hit enemy, or destroy ground he stands on. First player to get 5 points wins.

Controlls:

Player 1:

A - move left

D - move right

Space - jump

K - pull orb

L - push orb

Player 2:

Dpad left - move left

Dpad right - move right

B - jump

X or left trigger - pull orb

A or right trigger - push orb

All assets other then background and music were made during Jam.

Background by - edermunizz https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-hill
Music by - XCVG https://opengameart.org/content/fast-fight-battle-music-looped
